mapper.insert: INSERT newspaper(application_time, project_name, contact_person, contact_number, detailed_address, applicant, newspaper_type, type_of_water, number_of_water_users, estimated_amount_of_water, remark, material,verification, status, application_coding) values(#{applicationTime},#{projectName},#{contactPerson}, #{contactNumber},#{detailedAddress},#{applicant}, #{newspaperType},#{typeOfWater},#{numberOfWaterUsers}, #{estimatedAmountOfWater},#{remark},#{material},#{verification},#{status},#{applicationCoding})
mapper.update: UPDATE newspaper set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.application_time, n.project_name, n.contact_person, n.contact_number, n.detailed_address, n.applicant,newspaper_type, n.type_of_water, n.number_of_water_users, n.estimated_amount_of_water, n.remark, n.material, n.verification, n.status, n.application_coding FROM newspaper n WHERE n.verification = #{verification} order by n.application_time desc
